title: About Me
content: Senior Front-End Developer with 6 years of proven leadership and meaningful contributions to teams of varying size and scope. With my quality-driven mentality along with seeking, learning and teaching new, efficient technologies, I am able to make aggressive deadlines consistently achievable. Passionate about going the extra mile to ensure the best performance for website, my customers are unquestionably satisfied with the product or service provided. With emphasis on scalable and well-documented code, I look forward to working collaboratively as well as being a highly contributive member in your company.
